TypeSignature.Value: public delegate uint PropSheetPageProc(IntPtr hwnd, uint uMsg, IntPtr lParam);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropSheetPageProc extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function PropSheetPageProc(hwnd As IntPtr, uMsg As UInteger, lParam As IntPtr) As UInteger
public delegate System::UInt32 PropSheetPageProc(IntPtr hwnd, System::UInt32 uMsg, IntPtr lParam);
type PropSheetPageProc = delegate of nativeint * uint32 * nativeint -> uint32

param.name: hwnd
param.span: 保留；必须为 NULL（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

span.span: Reserved; must be null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

param.name: uMsg
param.span: 一个操作标志，它指定一个说明正在创建页或者正在销毁页的页或对话框。

span.span: An action flag specifying that a page or a dialog box for a page is being created or a page is being destroyed.

param.name: lParam
param.span: 一个指针，它指向一个定义正在创建或销毁的页的结构。

span.span: A pointer to a structure defining the page being created or destroyed.

summary.span: 指定当创建页时以及将销毁页时属性表调用的回调函数。

span.span: Specifies a callback function that a property sheet calls when a page is created and when the page is about to be destroyed.
